text: Oliver Richard Trethowan Sale (born 30 September 1995) is an English cricketer who plays for Somerset County Cricket Club. On 29 July 2016 he made his Twenty20 debut for Somerset against Hampshire in the 2016 NatWest t20 Blast. ==Early life== Ollie Sale was born on 30 September 1995 in Newcastle-under- Lyme, Staffordshire, England and attended Sherborne School in Sherborne, Dorset. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Somerset cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Newcastle-under-Lyme Category:People educated at Sherborne School Category:Alumni of Newcastle University
title: Ollie Sale
